name: Running Grandma
description:
You're a Grandma in a cold day. 

Help the kids that are outside by giving them some sweaters to protect them from the cold weather

CONTROLS

[a/d] - [side arrow keys]  = movement

[w] - [up arrow key] = dash

Indie Dev Day Game Jam entry made by @DaniRiwez

***Right now the game has some minor errors.  I'll fix them as soon as possible
